affymetrix.calvin.exception
Class CalvinException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          affymetrix.calvin.exception.CalvinException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CDFAccessNotSupportedByModeException, ColumnIndexOutOfBoundsException, DataGroupNotFoundException, DataSetNotFoundException, DataSetNotOpenException, InvalidFileTypeException, InvalidVersionException, NotImplementedException, ProbeSetNotFoundException, RowIndexOutOfBoundsException, UnexpectedColumnTypeException, UnsignedOutOfLimitsException
public class CalvinException
extends java.lang.Exception

Base exception class for the Calvin File SDK.

See Also:

serialVersionUID

See Also:
Constant Field Values

sourceName

protected java.lang.String sourceName
Source in the WIN32 use case is used for registry lookup to determine the resource file. The message code is used incojuction with source to lookup the specific message string based on code.

errorDescription

protected java.lang.String errorDescription
Message for the exception

Constructor Detail

CalvinException

public CalvinException()
Constructor Default constructor. Initializes all variables to 0 if numeric, "" if string and the date to the current date and time.

CalvinException

public CalvinException(java.lang.String _Source,
                       java.lang.String _Description,
                       java.lang.String _TimeStamp,
                       java.lang.String _FileName,
                       short _LineNumber,
                       long _ErrorCode)
Constructor Constructs a CalvinException object.

Parameters:
_Source - Typically will be the application name. Can also be the file sdk object type E.g. "Array File Reader".
_Description - A brief message which describes what happened.
_TimeStamp - Time and date the exception occured.
_FileName - File name of the source file the exception occured. The __FILE__ can be used to determine this information.
_LineNumber - Line number in the source file that generated the exception. The __LINE__ can be used to determine this information.
_ErrorCode - An numeric value the is unique to this error/exception type

CalvinException

public CalvinException(java.lang.String _Source,
                       java.lang.String _Description,
                       long _ErrorCode)
Constructor Constructs a CalvinException object Note: The time date stamp will be automatically set to the current time.

Parameters:
_Source - Typically will be the application name. Can also be the file sdk object type E.g. "Array File Reader".
_Description - A brief message which describes what happened.
_ErrorCode - An numeric value the is unique to this error/exception type
